memetics.name: Oil Processing
memetics.effect_description: Turn Stardust Ore and Portable Mixed Fuel into Stardust Source using the Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Spectral Cloak
memetics.effect_description: Activate to become Cloaked for 120s. Upon leaving combat, you'll become Stealthy. Use up to 10 times.

memetics.name: Nalcott Easter Egg
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Nalcott Easter Egg
memetics.effect_description: Use to receive the contents of a random Settlement Loot Crate.

memetics.name: Rifle Turret: Two Birds One Stone
memetics.effect_description: Rifle Turrets gain DMG +30% and Durability +30%, and trigger the Bounce effect upon hitting an enemy.

memetics.name: Supplies Workbench: Forest Hunter
memetics.effect_description: Crossbow Bolt output +50% and crafting time -50%.

memetics.name: Rosetta Gathering Drone
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formula: Rosetta Gathering Drone.
memetics.effect_description: The Rosetta Gathering Drone can be summoned at any time. If the player hasn't reached their Load limit, the drone will automatically seek out and gather the highest-level minerals nearby. The special advanced effects depend on the crafting materials used.

memetics.name: Armor Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. When the drone has no Shield, it automatically consumes 3 Electronic Parts every 30s to gain 5,000 Shield.

memetics.name: Load Handling
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, it reduces the weight of Logs, Gravels, and Ores you carry by 40% - 80%. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Pickaxe: Moonlight Mining
memetics.effect_description: When using the Pickaxe to mine, increase the yield of Copper Ore, Tin Ore, Iron Ore, Aluminum Ore, and Tungsten by 25%. Effect doubles at night (21:00â€“06:00).

memetics.name: Chainsaw: Chainsaw Horror Show
memetics.effect_description: Electric Chainsaw gains Max Durability +50%, Attack Speed +30%, and Melee DMG +100%.

memetics.name: Furnace: Sintering
memetics.effect_description: Sintered Brick and Glass crafting time +50% and yield +100%.

memetics.name: High Power Warhead
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: High Power Warhead
memetics.effect_description: A lightweight warhead that deals more damage to buildings and vehicles.

memetics.name: Golden Knife
memetics.effect_description: A golden throwing dagger with extremely high damage. Upon hitting an enemy, it triggers the Unstable Bomber effect. If it hits a Deviant's Weakspot, trigger 1 additional Unstable Bomber effect.

memetics.name: Blade Fan
memetics.effect_description: Made of multiple Throwing Daggers. Upon hitting a target, it triggers different effects based on the Throwing Daggers used.

memetics.name: Combo Chipset
memetics.effect_description: Turn Electronic Parts, Metal Scrap, and Parts into the Combo Chipset using the Supplies Workbench. The Combo Chipset can be sold for a large number of Energy Links.

memetics.name: Solar Generator: Photon Power
memetics.effect_description: Solar Generator power output +10W.

memetics.name: Crystal Transformation
memetics.effect_description: Turn Stardust Source and alloy ingots into various types of Crystals at the Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Furnace: Large Furnace
memetics.effect_description: For every 5Â°C increase in the environmental temperature, output increases by 1%, with no upper limit.

memetics.name: Molecular Structure Research
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formulas: Ice Crystal and Fire Crystal
memetics.effect_description: Use Hot Rock Ore or Cold Crystal Ore to craft Fire Crystals and Ice Crystals at the Supplies Workbench.

memetics.name: Scout Drone: Freezing Drone
memetics.effect_description: Scout Drones reduce the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units.

memetics.name: Refining Facility: Smelting
memetics.effect_description: The Refining Facility can refine Sulfur into Hot Rock Ore.

memetics.name: Rosetta Territory Drone
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formula: Rosetta Territory Drone.
memetics.effect_description: The Rosetta Territory Drone can be summoned at any time. When the player is within their territory, the drone unlocks long-range shooting capabilities, while all allied turrets and traps within the territory gain a 50% Attack boost. The special advanced effects depend on the crafting materials used.

memetics.name: Focus Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Gathering Drone: When mining in contest areas, the drone has a chance to extract 10-100 barrels of crude oil from underground layers. Firepower Drone: Attacks can trigger the Unstable Bomber effect. Exploration Drone: Glide Stamina consumption is reduced by 50%, and every 4s during gliding, it automatically marks a random enemy within 20 meters. Territory Drone: After 10 cumulative hits, it provides a 5% boost to Weapon DMG and Status DMG for all allies within 15 meters for 10s, stacking up to 3 times.

memetics.name: Electronics Grabber
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, there is a small to medium chance to receive additional electronic modules when opening a Storage Crate. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Wood Structures: Tough Plant
memetics.effect_description: Structures built from wood obtain the Tough Plant effect and Durability +150%.

memetics.name: Improved Compound Fertilizer
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Improved Compound Fertilizer
memetics.effect_description: A crop fertilizer that massively enhances crop yield and deviation probability, but reduces growth speed.

memetics.name: Electric Furnace: Electrolysis
memetics.effect_description: Doubles yield when smelting Aluminum and Tungsten Ingots using the Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Ultra Grenade
memetics.effect_description: Higher Blast DMG, and additional bonus DMG against buildings and vehicles.

memetics.name: Rare Crystal Set
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Rare Crystal Set
memetics.effect_description: You can refine crystals into Rare Crystal Sets at the Electric Furnace. Rare Crystal Sets can be sold for a larger number of Energy Links.

memetics.name: Gatling Cannon: Power Blast
memetics.effect_description: Gatling Cannons deal +30% DMG. When your Territory exits combat, Durability recovers to 100%.

memetics.name: Frost Armor
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Frost Shield Generator
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted at the Advanced Synthesis Bench. When the temperature is below 0Â°C, gain a shield equal to 200% Psi Intensity. The shield refreshes every 300 seconds. If crafted with Fire Crystals, the shield's value is increased to 500% Psi Intensity.

memetics.name: Claymore Mine: Frost Trap
memetics.effect_description: Generates 4 Frost Vortexes when triggered.

memetics.name: Invisible Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Automatically consumes 10 Stardust Sources to make the drone enter invisible state for 5 minutes. The drone exits invisible state when dealing damage.

memetics.name: Backpack Expansion
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, your Max Load is increased by 40â€“80. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Gardening Gloves
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, there is a 6% - 12% chance to double the seeds when acquiring plant seeds. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Activated Carbon Filter
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Activated Carbon Purifier
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, you have a 30% chance of receiving Boiled Water or Purified Water when gathering water with a flask. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Iced Treat: Brain Freeze
memetics.effect_description: Iced Dish effect duration +200% and effect magnitude +30%.

memetics.name: Art of Stardust Decay
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Art of Stardust Decay
memetics.effect_description: Consume Stardust Source to craft Acid using the Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Gunpowder Extraction
memetics.effect_description: Use Hot Rock Ore and other materials to craft gunpowder at the Supplies Workbench.

memetics.name: Portable Thermostat
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted at the Supplies Workbench. Reduces or increases the environmental temperature within 3 meters by 20Â°C (effect does not stack).

memetics.name: Wide-Area Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Gathering Drone: Doubles the yield when collecting minerals and destroys all gathered items within a 3-meter radius. Firepower Drone: Attacks can trigger the Bounce effect. Exploration Drone: Significantly increases horizontal gliding speed and grants 20% DMG Reduction while gliding. Territory Drone: When in territory, the drone automatically generates a spherical shield every 30s, capable of absorbing DMG equal to 5,000% of the drone's Attack.

memetics.name: Stove: Long-Term Storage
memetics.effect_description: Doubles the shelf life of Dishes you cook.

memetics.name: Bed: A Place to Call Home
memetics.effect_description: Sleep for more than 10s to cure all diseases and reduce Stamina depletion for the next 10 minutes.

memetics.name: Synthesis Bench: Recycle & Reuse
memetics.effect_description: When crafting Drones, Turrets, Stardust Shields, Spectrum Generators, and Projection Generators, increase their use count by 1.

memetics.name: Planter Box: Greenhouse Planting
memetics.effect_description: Increases crop growth rate. Yield +1 for every 20Â°C increase in temperature.

memetics.name: Grenade: Cluster Grenade
memetics.effect_description: After exploding, it generates a secondary bomb that sticks to a random target hit and explodes after a delay.

memetics.name: Nurture Coherence Injection
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Gene Extractor and Nurture Coherence Injection.
memetics.effect_description: When holding a Gene Extractor, defeating Deviants yields gene fragments based on enemy types. These fragments can be used to craft the Gene Coherence Injection for enhancing gathering abilities. The Coherence status ends after taking damage equal to 70% of your Max HP. After using the Nurture Coherence Injection, each gathering action grants 1 Coherence, with the following effects based on the materials used: Deviant Fragment: At 10 Coherence, Mining Savage Strike Rate +50%, and Mining Last Hit Yield +100%. Anima Fragment: At 10 Coherence, while holding a pickaxe or chainsaw, Movement Speed +15%, and the yield of Logs, Sulfur, Silver Ore, Gold Ore, and Stardust Ore +30%. Starlith: At 30 Coherence, consume all Coherence to increase final hit yield from logging and mining by 1,000% for 5s. Matterlith: At 30 Coherence, there's a small chance to trigger an Oil Gusher when mining in contest areas, granting 30 Barreled Crude Oil to all allied players within 5 meters.

memetics.name: Pickaxe: Forest Foe
memetics.effect_description: Pickaxe Durability is doubled. Enjoy +30% yield when logging with the Pickaxe, and gain 150% of the resources when you completely destroy a tree.

memetics.name: Flamethrower Trap: Scorching Blast
memetics.effect_description: Flamethrower Trap DMG +30%. When the Flamethrower Trap kills an enemy, an explosion is triggered, dealing AoE Blast DMG to all nearby units. Cooldown: 1 second.

memetics.name: Precious Metal Refining
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Precious Metal Refining
memetics.effect_description: Smelt Gold and Silver Ores into Ingots using the Electric Furnace. The Ingots can be sold for a large number of Energy Links.

memetics.name: Portable Fridge
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, food in your Backpack spoils 70%â€“90% less quickly. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Biomass Missile: Ample Munition
memetics.effect_description: Plasma Missile weight -80% and yield +2.

memetics.name: Gold Pickaxe and Silver Pickaxe
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formulas: Gold Axe and Silver Axe
memetics.effect_description: The Gold Pickaxe and Silver Pickaxe have low Durability. When using the Gold Pickaxe to mine, you have a chance of obtaining Masala. When using the Silver Pickaxe to log, you have a chance of obtaining a random fruit.

memetics.name: Stardust Mining Platform
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Facility: Stardust Mining Platform
memetics.effect_description: Increases Mining yield by 20%. Can mine Stardust Ore when in a Pollution Zone.

memetics.name: Hydraulic Generator: One with the Tides
memetics.effect_description: Maximum number of Generators +1. Hydraulic Generator power output +0â€“7W depending on the speed of water flow.

memetics.name: Lightning Gene Fabric
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Lightning Gene Fabric.
memetics.effect_description: The gear being crafted gains the following effects: Crit DMG Reduction +3%. If this gear is a Top, it gains a bonus effect: while in the Coherence status, when attacked, a lightning strike will be generated under the attacker's feet after a 3s delay, dealing damage equal to 4,000% Psi Intensity (cooldown: 30s).

memetics.name: Healing Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Every 10 minutes, automatically consumes 10 Adhesive, Metal Scraps, and 5 Rubber to restore 50% Durability to the lowest Durability gear being worn.

memetics.name: Jump Booster
memetics.effect_description: Use to gain the double jump ability for 30 seconds. Can use up to 5 times.

memetics.name: Updraft Device: Gravity Lite
memetics.effect_description: The Updraft Cannon reduces nearby gravity and grants increased Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

memetics.name: Supplies Workbench: Anti-Armor
memetics.effect_description: Yield +30% and Crafting Time -50% when crafting AP Ammo.

memetics.name: Bed: Heat Preservation
memetics.effect_description: Sleep for more than 10s to gain 30% Cold Resist for the next 30 minutes.

memetics.name: Frag Grenade: Viscoelastic Cold Fire
memetics.effect_description: Units hit by the Frag Grenade will be marked with Cold Fire. When a marked unit is killed, the environmental temperature within a certain range is reduced by 100Â°C.

memetics.name: Super Refinery
memetics.effect_description: Has increased transformation efficiency, and can transform Acid into Portable Mixed Fuel.

memetics.name: Portable Diving Gear
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Portable Diving Gear
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, increase Oxygen by 40% - 100% and Swimming Speed by 20% - 40% when diving. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Robotics Facility: Skilled Mechanician
memetics.effect_description: Trap and Rifle Turret facilities gain Durability +50%.

memetics.name: Electric Furnace: Efficiency Lover
memetics.effect_description: Power Consumption -50%, and Crafting Time -60%.

memetics.name: Stone Structures: Intense Defense
memetics.effect_description: Structures built from stone gain the Intense Defense effect and Durability +100%.

memetics.name: Gravitational Grip: Bonds of Guidance
memetics.effect_description: When the Gravitational Grip trap is triggered by an enemy, there is a 20% chance to inflict The Bull's Eye on the target.

memetics.name: Stardust Barrier: Hold the Line
memetics.effect_description: Stardust Barriers gain HP +50%. When a Stardust Barrier is deployed, it restores 50% HP for all allies within 3 meters. Stardust Barrier becomes a reusable item with up to 5 uses.

memetics.name: Pulse Power Device
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Pulse Power Device
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, if you are struck by lightning, recover all HP and gain Movement Speed +15% and Psi Intensity +30% for 60 seconds. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Snowmobile
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted at the Supplies Workbench. Movement Speed in snow +20%, Movement Speed in blizzards +10%, Cold Resist +10.

memetics.name: Furnace: Chaosium Material Analysis
memetics.effect_description: When using Furnaces and Electric Furnaces to produce Chaosium, production speed -30%; Chaosium yield +1 for every 5Â°C in excess of 30Â°C, up to a maximum of +10.

memetics.name: Portable Gun Turret: Explosive Automatic Ammo
memetics.effect_description: The MG Turret's bullets have a chance of triggering Unstable Bomber.

memetics.name: Biomass Generator: Heat Generator
memetics.effect_description: Can use Hot Rock Ore to generate electricity. Power output +30%.

memetics.name: Flamethrower Trap: Kebob Party
memetics.effect_description: Flamethrower Traps inflict Burn. If the enemy has more than 10 stacks of Burn, they explode 1 time. Cooldown: 1 second.

memetics.name: Rosetta Firepower Drone
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formula: Rosetta Firepower Drone.
memetics.effect_description: The Rosetta Firepower Drone can be summoned at any time. The drone has mid-range shooting capabilities. The special advanced effects depend on the crafting materials used.

memetics.name: Extreme Gene Fabric
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Extreme Gene Fabric.
memetics.effect_description: The gear being crafted gains the following effects: Weakspot DMG Reduction +3%. If this gear is a Top, it gains a bonus effect: when the Coherence status is terminated, gain invincibility, but Weapon DMG, Status DMG, and Tactical Item DMG drop to 0 for 2s.

memetics.name: Portable Rainwater Collection System
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Portable Rainwater Collection System
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, slowly recover Hydration, and a 30% - 60% chance to receive 1 Dirty Water, Pure Water, or Acid every minute when it rains. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Adrenaline Shot: Phoenix
memetics.effect_description: For 10 seconds after respawning, gain bonus DMG Reduction and slowly recover HP.

memetics.name: Deviant Power Generator: Stardust Unleashed
memetics.effect_description: Increase Deviant Power Generator's power output by 15%.

memetics.name: Spicy Pepper
memetics.effect_description: Dishes that include Spicy Pepper as an ingredient are 30% more effective. When consumed, they deal DMG equal to 10% Psi Intensity to nearby enemies, with a 30% chance to deal additional DMG equal to 90% Psi Intensity and inflict 1 stack of Burn.

memetics.name: Judgment Coherence Injection
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Gene Extractor and Judgment Coherence Injection.
memetics.effect_description: When holding a Gene Extractor, defeating Deviants yields gene fragments based on enemy types. These fragments can be used to craft the Gene Coherence Injection for enhancing combat abilities. The Coherence status ends after taking damage equal to 70% of your Max HP. After using the Judgement Coherence Injection, each enemy defeated grants 1 Coherence, with the following effects based on the materials used: Deviant Fragment: At 10 Coherence, Status DMG +10%. Anima Fragment: At 10 Coherence, Weapon DMG +10%. Starlith: At 30 Coherence, enter Beyond Mode, consuming 1 Coherence per attack, dealing 50 Sanity DMG to players, and DMG equal to 10% of Max HP to non-player enemies (up to 5,000). Exit Beyond Mode when Coherence is depleted. Matterlith: At 30 Coherence, Roll Stamina Consumption +50%, Roll Speed +30%, DMG Reduction during rolling increased to 80%, and summon a Flamethrower Trap that deals damage equal to 1,000% Psi Intensity over 5s.

memetics.name: Disassembly Bench: Careful Disassembly
memetics.effect_description: Yield +30% when disassembling Parts, Fabrics and Plastic.

memetics.name: Disassembly Bench: Electronic Recycling
memetics.effect_description: Yield +50% for Metal Scrap and Electronic Parts.

memetics.name: Chef's Knife
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, Meat yield +1 when Field Dressing animals, with a 30% - 60% chance to yield additional byproducts. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Roasted & Dried: Low and Slow
memetics.effect_description: Roasted and Dried Dishes now provide +15 Energy and +10% Sanity.

memetics.name: Basic Defense: Battle-Hardened
memetics.effect_description: Sandbags, Shelters, and High Fortifications gain the Battle-Hardened effect, Durability +100%. When your Territory exits combat, Durability recovers to 100%.

memetics.name: Supplies Workbench: Healing Boost
memetics.effect_description: HP Recovery +10% when crafting Activators, and Output +1.

memetics.name: Portable Updraft Device
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Portable Updraft Device
memetics.effect_description: Use to temporarily summon an updraft at the location for 30 seconds. When inside the updraft, jump height is increased. Can use up to 10 times.

memetics.name: Biomass Generator: Sustained Output
memetics.effect_description: Biomass Generator power output +5W, fuel longevity +150%.

memetics.name: Generator: Electrical Expert
memetics.effect_description: Generator output +2W. Maximum number of Generators +1.

memetics.name: Reinforced Structures: Healing Defense
memetics.effect_description: Reinforced structures gain the Healing Defense effect. When your territory exits combat, the Durability of reinforced structures is automatically restored to 80%.

memetics.name: Elysium Coherence Injection
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Gene Extractor and Elysium Coherence Injection.
memetics.effect_description: When holding a Gene Extractor, defeating Deviants yields gene fragments based on enemy types. These fragments can be used to craft the Gene Coherence Injection for enhancing both defensive and offensive abilities. The Coherence status ends after taking damage equal to 70% of your Max HP. After using the Elysium Coherence Injection, staying in any territory for 3s will grant you 1 Coherence, with the following effects based on the materials used: Deviant Fragment: At 10 Coherence, unlock Double Jump and Aerial Sprint abilities within your territory. Anima Fragment: At 10 Coherence, Attack of all allied turrets and traps within the territory +50%. Starlith: At 30 Coherence, convert all Coherence to Ascension, increasing Psi Intensity by 1% per stack but reducing Attack by 0.5%. Each attack consumes one stack of Ascension. Matterlith: At 30 Coherence, while in the territory, Stamina Consumption -30%, Roll Speed +30%, and Tactical Item DMG +30%.

memetics.name: Bastille Gene
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance the Gene Coherence Injection and unlock its advanced capabilities. Enter Bastille status after standing still for 2s. In Bastille status, DMG Reduction +10%, Weakspot DMG Reduction +20%, and taking hits from enemies will mark them (cooldown: 10s).

memetics.name: Proliferation Gene Fabric
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Proliferation Gene Fabric.
memetics.effect_description: The gear being crafted gains the following effects: Max Load +10%. If this gear is a Top, it gains a bonus effect: While in the Coherence status, convert a small amount of Barreled Crude Oil in your backpack into Portable Mixed Fuel every 30s.

memetics.name: Load Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Every 10 minutes, automatically consumes 5 Portable Mixed Fuel to increase the player's Max Load by 100 for 10 minutes.

memetics.name: Electric Drill: Treasure Hunter
memetics.effect_description: Enjoy +100% yield when mining for Gold Ore, Silver Ore, and Stardust Ore with an Electric Drill.

memetics.name: Lucky Logging Platform
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Facility: Lucky Logging Platform
memetics.effect_description: Receive random crops when in a sunny area.

memetics.name: Scout Drone: Invisible Hunter
memetics.effect_description: Scout Drones enjoy The Bull's Eye effect, +30% Scout Drone HP and DMG. Scout Drones can also now be used up to 5 times.

memetics.name: Kitchen Set: Gourmand
memetics.effect_description: Dishes made at the Kitchen Set gain base effect +30%, effect duration +50%, and crafting time -50%.

memetics.name: Stardust Dish: Shell Break
memetics.effect_description: The Stardust Dish provides 2 special Whim effects. For 30 minutes after consuming it, you will recover HP over time when your Sanity is full.

memetics.name: Grenade: Line Charge
memetics.effect_description: When it explodes, it pulls affected Deviants toward the center of the explosion.

memetics.name: Generator: Heat Dissipation
memetics.effect_description: When the nearby temperature is higher than 20Â°C, every 1 additional degree increases power output by 0.2%; when the nearby temperature is higher than 60Â°C, every 1 additional degree increases power output by 0.5%, up to 40%.

memetics.name: Grilled Dish: Grilling Master
memetics.effect_description: Grilled Dishes grant Cold Resist +10 for 10 minutes when consumed; yield +1.

memetics.name: Speedy Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Gathering Drone: When the player holds a gathering tool, Max Stamina increases by 50, Movement Speed increases by 20%, and Sprint Speed increases by 30%; final hit yield during gathering increases by 200%. Firepower Drone: Unlocks an electric shock skill for the drone, which can dash toward enemies within range, paralyzing them for 3s. Exploration Drone: Grants the player a 15% Movement Speed boost and double jump ability. Territory Drone: When the player is in someone else's territory, Stamina consumption decreases by 30%, Roll Speed increases by 30%, and Tactical Item DMG increases by 30%.

memetics.name: Explosive On-the-Go
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, the weight of Grenades, Molotov Cocktails, High Explosives, Shrapnel Grenades, Thermite Grenades, RPG7 Rockets, and MGL Grenades is reduced by 30%â€“60%. After using a throwable, you gain Sprint Speed by 20% for 2s. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Compost Bin
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, if there is Spoiled Food in your Backpack, 1 - 3 Spoiled Foods will be consumed every 10 - 5 minutes, and be turned into Mushrooms or random Fertilizer. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Claymore Mine: Warrior's Resolve
memetics.effect_description: Claymore Mine deals an additional 4000 + 400% Psi Intensity damage and increases Max HP by 400% Psi Intensity.

memetics.name: Canned Goods: Mini Canner
memetics.effect_description: +1 yield when crafting Canned Goods.

memetics.name: Stardust Regulator
memetics.effect_description: Immediately recover 70% HP and gain a shield equal to 30% Max HP. Cooldown: 30 seconds (not shared with Activators). Can be used up to 15 times.

memetics.name: Gear Workbench: Customization
memetics.effect_description: Weapons and Armor crafted using the Gear Workbench enjoy +30% Max Durability.

memetics.name: Throwing Dagger: Bullseye
memetics.effect_description: Throwing Dagger +30% DMG. After killing an enemy with a Throwing Dagger, the next throw +100% DMG.

memetics.name: Portable MG Turret: Barrage of Bullets
memetics.effect_description: Portable MG Turrets gain HP and DMG +30%, and their shots can trigger the Bounce effect. Portable MG Turret becomes a reusable item with up to 5 uses.

memetics.name: Red Plasma Rounds
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Red Plasma Rounds
memetics.effect_description: Special ammunition used by Gatling Cannons. They are extremely expensive but overwhelmingly powerful. There is no bullet drop in its trajectory, deals tons of damage, and has a large explosive radius. Can be kept for 24 hours.

memetics.name: Ice Throwing Dagger and Flame Throwing Dagger
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formulas: Ice Throwing Dagger and Flame Throwing Dagger
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted with Hot Rock Ore or Cold Crystal Ore at the Supplies Workbench. Increases or reduces the target's environmental temperature upon hitting.

memetics.name: Water Pump: Underground Pump
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Formula: Icebreaker Water Pump
memetics.effect_description: You can install it on an ice surface or water surface to break the ice and gather the resources below.

memetics.name: Metal Dissolution
memetics.effect_description: Use Acid and Gold Ore to craft Chaosium at the Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Composite Crystal
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted with Cold Crystal Ore or Hot Rock Ore at the Supplies Workbench. Can be sold for a high price.

memetics.name: Extreme Gene
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance the Gene Coherence Injection and unlock its advanced capabilities. The Coherence status termination condition changes to total damage taken reaching 150% of Max HP. When HP is below 50%, Max Load +50. When HP is below 30%, Weapon DMG +15%, Tactical Item DMG +15%. When HP is below 10%, trigger a healing effect, recovering 1% of Max HP for each unused point of Max Load (30s cooldown).

memetics.name: Support Module
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance drones and unlock their advanced capabilities. Gathering Drone: Every 30s, converts some ores from the player's backpack into corresponding metal ingots without consuming fuel or acid. Firepower Drone: Unlocks a healing skill for the drone, which heals the ally with the lowest HP within range. If a player falls and doesn't Black Out within 10s, their fallen state will be removed. Exploration Drone: The player enters invisible state after leaving combat. Territory Drone: When the player is in their own territory, recovers 5% HP per second; if HP drops below 50%, enters invisible state (30s cooldown).

memetics.name: Bastille Gene Fiber
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Bastille Gene Fabric.
memetics.effect_description: The gear being crafted gains the following effects: Gear Durability +30%. If this gear is a top, it gains a bonus effect: while in the Coherence status, automatically consume 10 Stardust Source per minute and restore 10% Durability to a piece of gear with the lowest Durability.

memetics.name: Furnace: Precision Refining
memetics.effect_description: Resource Consumption -30%, and Smelting Time -30% when smelting Copper, Bronze, Steel, Aluminum, and Tungsten Ingots using a Furnace or Electric Furnace.

memetics.name: Harvesting Sickle
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, there is a 20%â€“40% chance to double the yield when gathering in the wilderness. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Deluxe Storage Crate
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Facility: Deluxe Storage Crate
memetics.effect_description: A large Storage Crate with 64 item slots.

memetics.name: Solar Drill
memetics.effect_description: The Solar Drill charges itself on sunny days. Enjoy +15%-40% yields of Copper Ore, Tin Ore, Iron Ore, Aluminum Ore and Tungsten Ore.

memetics.name: Explosive Throwables: Echo Blast
memetics.effect_description: High-Explosive Grenades, Shrapnel Grenades, Molotov Cocktails, and Thermite Grenades gain DMG +30%, and will trigger an additional explosion with the first target killed, dealing DMG equal to 400% Psi Intensity.

memetics.name: Silentfire Shield
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted at the Synthesis Bench. When the environmental temperature falls below -10Â°C, generate a 360Â° shield for up to 300 seconds. Shield Value = Your HP + 100% Psi Intensity - Current Temperature * 500.

memetics.name: Proliferation Gene
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance the Gene Coherence Injection and unlock its advanced capabilities. After using the injection, create a Proliferation Zone. Within this zone, the acquisition amount for all Parts, Fabrics, Plastics, Metal Scraps, Rubber, Adhesives, Electronic Parts, Crystals, and Acid is increased by 30% for 10s.

memetics.name: Explosive Sack
memetics.effect_description: When in your Backpack, you have a 30%â€“60% chance of salvaging Mixed Explosives after using High-Explosive Grenades, Shrapnel Grenades, or Explosives, and a 30%â€“60% chance of salvaging Sulfur after using Molotov Cocktails or Thermite Grenades. Effect cannot stack.

memetics.name: Supplies Workbench: Ammo Factory
memetics.effect_description: Crafting Output +50% when crafting regular Ammunition.

memetics.name: Sulfur Chemist
memetics.effect_description: You can use Sulfur and Energy Links to slowly craft Acid at the Synthesis Bench.

memetics.name: Stardust Water Pump
memetics.effect_title: Unlock New Facility: Stardust Water Pump
memetics.effect_description: A special water pump that can extract Stardust Source from polluted soil when supplied with Storage Batteries.

memetics.name: Shotgun Turret: Volley Fire
memetics.effect_description: Shotgun Turrets gain DMG +30%, Power Consumption -30%, and have a 30% chance to trigger a Shrapnel effect upon hitting an enemy.

memetics.name: Dummy: Fear and Terror
memetics.effect_description: Automatically attracts nearby Deviants.

memetics.name: Deviant Power Generator: Energy Extraction
memetics.effect_description: Deviant Power Generator power output +10%. If the environmental temperature is higher than 50Â°C, power output +20% more.

memetics.name: Fish Pheromones
memetics.effect_description: Can be crafted with pheromones from certain fish at the Supplies Workbench. Use it to increase your chances of catching specific kinds of fish.

memetics.name: Speed Coherence Injection
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formulas: Gene Extractor and Speed Coherence Injection.
memetics.effect_description: When holding a Gene Extractor, defeating Deviants yields gene fragments based on enemy types. These fragments can be used to craft the Gene Coherence Injection for enhancing mobility. The Coherence status ends after taking damage equal to 70% of your Max HP. After using the Speed Coherence Injection, moving for 2s grants 1 Coherence, with the following effects based on the materials used: Deviant Fragment: At 10 Coherence, enhance V's abilities, reducing Gliding Speed by 70% and increasing horizontal Gliding Speed by 50%. Anima Fragment: At 10 Coherence, recover 5% HP and Sanity per second while driving, and gain Shield equal to 60% of Max HP when exiting driving (cooldown: 30s). Starlith: At 30 Coherence, gain invisibility for 10s after gliding ends. Matterlith: At 30 Coherence, while in a mobile territory or vehicle, Weapon DMG +20%, Status DMG +20%, and DMG Reduction +20%.

memetics.name: Rosetta Exploration Drone
memetics.effect_title: Unlock new formula: Rosetta Exploration Drone.
memetics.effect_description: The Rosetta Exploration Drone can be summoned at any time. When present, it can replace V for special gliding. This special gliding has no takeoff height limit and doesn't lose altitude during flight, but Stamina consumption is greatly increased. The special advanced effects depend on the crafting materials used.

memetics.name: Lightning Gene
memetics.effect_description: A special item to enhance the Gene Coherence Injection and unlock its advanced capabilities. In combat, automatically select a random enemy within 20 meters every 10s, generating a lightning strike beneath them after a 3s delay, dealing damage equal to 4,000% Psi Intensity.
